meanings.definition: A person who uses a gun to commit a crime.
meanings.sent1: The gunmen robbed the bank last night.
meanings.sent2: The police are searching for the gunmen involved in the shooting.
meanings.sent3: The gunmen tried to steal cookies from the jar, but got caught red-handed.
meanings.sent4: The gunmen of corruption aim to destroy the trust in our society.
meanings.sent5: The image of the gunmen in black masks stayed etched in my memory.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of gunmen entering the building.
meanings.sent2: The news reported that the gunmen were apprehended by the authorities.
meanings.sent3: The gunmen gathered for a game of paintball in the forest.
meanings.sent4: The gunmen on the chessboard strategically moved to capture the king.
meanings.sent5: The gunmen stood in a line, their weapons gleaming in the sunlight.
